text: Hey Derek! We don't have any current plans to add non-DND page templates to the boilerplate. Would you mind sharing your use case for not using DND templates? Would it be more for locking down pages from a developer perspective where marketers shouldn't have as much control over the layout?

Well the biggest issue i am facing with dnd templates is the lack of use with Dynamic pages. for example if i was to open a dnd template and change all of my tags and photos using {{dynamic_page_hubdb_row.....}} tags, it will all adjust accordingly. The moment you open the page in the front end dnd side, everything disappears and will NOT reappear.
Thanks for the info, yeah I think that makes sense. Would it be beneficial to have a simpler non-DND area template for the use case of dynamic pages leveraging HubDB?
for the future yes. right now im just using bootstrap and building the template my self

Perfect, I just created an issue for this (<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/issues/171>) so we can start discussing/looking into this a bit more. Thank you again for the feedback :thumbsup:
